products.name: TAC-734G – WEB SPRAY HIGH TACK INFUSION MOLDING ADHESIVE
products.description: ForzaBOND™ TAC-734G is a web spray adhesive tackifier specifically designed to be compatible with resins used in the infusion molding RTM & LRTM process.
benefits: Single sided glue application even on heavy fiberglass mats
Safely fuses laminating materials to structural core surfaces
Ultimately becomes part of the polymer matrix
Provides superior holding during forming process
Allows resin to obtain maximum tensile strength
Will not interfere with the curing process of vinyl ester, polyesters, or styrene safe

products.name: TAC-735R – MIST SPRAY NO HAPS INFUSION MOLDING ADHESIVE
products.description: ForzaBOND™ TAC-735R is a mist spray adhesive tackifier specifically designed to be compatible with resins used in the infusion molding RTM & LRTM process.

products.name: TAC-738R – WEB SPRAY ZERO VOC INFUSION MOLDING ADHESIVE
products.description: ForzaBOND™ TAC-738R is a web spray adhesive tackifier specifically designed to be compatible with resins used in the infusion molding RTM & LRTM process.
benefits: Designed to not interfere with curing process of vinyl ester, polyester, and styrene resins
Tackifier Resin, engineered to dissolve and become part of polymer matrix
Does not act as a contaminate to most resins
Helps improve overall strength of composite structures by eliminating wet out (uncured resin pockets)
Ultra efficient portable low maintenance spray system (requires no external air source)

products.name: OA75 – TROWELLABLE FLOORING ADHESIVE
products.description: ForzaBOND™ OA75 is a hardwood and bamboo adhesive and moisture control membrane all in one. This adhesive formulation maintains long term durability and moisture control properties, and it is easy to spread and clean off of prefinished flooring before and after cure. This adhesive has low VOC’s (as measured per EPA Method 24) and does NOT contain any water.

products.name: C-OS9 – HYBRID POLYMER, STRUCTURAL, SINGLE-PART, MOISTURE CURE ADHESIVE
products.description: ForzaBOND™ C-OS9 is a hybrid polymer, structural, single-part, moisture cure adhesive.
products.applications:
ForzaBOND™ C-OS9 is designed for universal sealing applications in the construction industry, including:
- Crack filling on concrete
- Sealing around windows and door openings
- Sealing in gutter applications
- Roof penetrations
benefits: Retains strong bond through impact, peel, flex, and changing temperatures
Does not form bubbles, shrink, or crack upon curing
Can be painted in most applications
howToUse: Generally applied by extrusion, and trowel.
Surfaces should be clean and free of dust, oil, and grease.
Aluminum and other metals may be primed for best adhesion.
Apply between 34ºF and 150ºF, in damp and dry conditions.
Most of its strength develops in the first 24 hours.
Minimum cure time is overnight, but several days may be required for maximum performance, however cure time may be accelerated at higher temperatures.
Most parts do not require clamping, although heavy parts may require temporary clamping to ensure desired positioning.

products.description: ForzaBOND™ OA13 is a High Green Strength Mounting Adhesive.
benefits: High green strength for instant grip and initial bond
Can be used on a variety of substrates
Excellent adhesion to both porous and non-porous substrates
Resistant to water, weathering, and aging
Can be painted over once fully cured

products.name: OA23 – HYBRID POLYMER FAST GRAB ADHESIVE

products.name: CA1000 – INSTANT ADHESIVE
products.description: ForzaBOND® CA1000 is a medium-to-high viscosity surface-insensitive instant adhesive.

products.name: CA1500 – INSTANT ADHESIVE
products.description: ForzaBOND® CA1500 is a high viscosity surface-insensitive instant adhesive.

products.name: CA2400 – INSTANT ADHESIVE
products.description: ForzaBOND® CA2400 is a high viscosity surface-insensitive instant adhesive.

products.name: OS2 – MULTI-PURPOSE HYBRID POLYMER SEALANT
products.description: ForzaSEAL™ OS2 is a non-hazardous, moisture-cure sealant.
benefits: Retains strong bond through impact, peel, flex and changing temperature
Easily apply by extrusion or trowel
Does not form bubbles, shrink or crack
Low temperature flexibility (properties retained to -75° F)

products.name: OS10 – PERFORMANCE POLYMER
products.description: ForzaSEAL® OS10 is a is a non-hazardous, California compliant, high strength, single part moisture cure sealant.
benefits: Retains strong seal through impact, peel, flex, and changing temperature
Does not form bubbles, shrink or crack

products.name: OS20 – HIGH-STRENGTH HYBRID POLYMER ADHESIVE/SEALANT
products.description: ForzaBOND™ OS20 is a non-hazardous, high strength, single part sealant.
benefits: Retains strong bond through impact, peel, flex and changing temperatures.
Easily applied by extrusion or trowel.
Does not form bubbles, shrink or crack.

products.name: OS25 – LOW MODULUS PERFORMANCE POLYMER
products.description: ForzaSEAL® OS25 is a very flexible, high performance polymer used to seal a variety of substrates.

products.name: OS31 – SELF-LEVELING HYBRID POLYMER SEALANT
products.description: ForzaSEAL™ OS31 is a self leveling sealant.

products.name: OS35 – SINGLE COMPONENT SILICONE SEALANT
products.description: ForzaSEAL® OS35 is a one-part, low-odor, neutral-cure oxime silicone sealant formulated for high-moisture environments. It’s noncorrosive, mildew-resistant, and built to perform in demanding applications.
benefits: Single components RTV (Room Temperature Vulcanising), Anti-fungal properties
Can be applied to overhead or vertical joints
Excellent UV resistant, does not crack, or collapse in direct sunlight
Bonds many surfaces: Clean metal-including chrome, painted surfaces, glasses, ceramics, most plastics, non-oily woods, fibrous cement and concrete surfaces
Di-electrical properties & FDA (Food Grade) Compliant. Sealing of solar panels and junction boxes.

products.name: OS37 – ACETOXY SILICONE
products.description: ForzaSEAL® OS37 is a single-part moisture cure RTV silicone sealant that is widely used in Construction, Automotive, and Industrial applications.

products.name: OS61 SELF-LEVELING PERFORMANCE POLYMER
products.description: ForzaSEAL® OS61 is a self-leveling performance polymer designed for a variety of sealing applications.

products.name: OS61 – HIGH PERFORMANCE SEMI SELF-LEVELING ADHESIVE / SEALANT
products.description: ForzaBOND™ OS61 is a one-component, flexible sealant engineered for contraction/expansion joints and seams in roofs and decks.
benefits: Retains strong bond through impact, peel, flex and changing temperatures
Easy to apply by extrusion, or trowel
Does not form bubbles, shrink or crack
Can be painted in most applications
Low temperature flexibility (properties retained to -75º F)
ASTM C920, Type S, Grade P, Class 25, Use T and M
Federal Specification TT-S-00230C, Type 1, Class A

products.name: T500 – BUTYL ADHESIVE TAPE
products.description: ForzaTAPE™ T500 is compounded to meet pre-engineered metal building specifications. The material is soft, resilient and easily worked by hand, yet adheres instantly to most uncleaned surfaces.
benefits: Preformed butyl tapes allow the erector precise control of volume and sealant placement on roof laps, end laps and side laps of metal buildings.
Excellent weathering characteristics while retaining adhesion and elasticity in both hot and cold environments.
Chemically inert and is non-corrosive to paint, metal, aluminum, copper, plastic and will not swell rubber.
